column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////When we got back to the hotel
column2: he was shocked that the personal size was so small and the crust wasn't really that deep. I wasn't surprised
column3: although my pizza seemed a little more deep dish than his
column4: maybe because I had more stuff on mine. It was so good
column7: the cheese! I will say although I ate the crust
column8: it didn't have any flavor to it. Maybe that's why they offer a butter crust option? Anyways
column9: I will be back here for sure!!!
